As of August 27, 2025, I'm spending all my time on these things:

- Raising 6 kids (18, 15.5, 13, 10, 7.5, and 3.5) and trying to stay sane ([family blog](http://www.heissatopia.com/)); the oldest is studying at Brigham Young University; the others are all at home
- Living in Atlanta and working as an assistant professor in the [Department of Public Management and Policy](https://aysps.gsu.edu/public-management-policy/) at the [Andrew Young School of Policy Studies](https://aysps.gsu.edu/) at [Georgia State University](https://www.gsu.edu/)
- [Researching](https://www.andrewheiss.com/research/) anti-NGO restrictions, human rights, and statistical methods for nonprofit and public administration
- Teaching [data visualization](https://datavizsp25.classes.andrewheiss.com/), [program evaluation](https://evalsp25.classes.andrewheiss.com/), [comparative public administration](https://compaf24.classes.andrewheiss.com/), [nonprofit management](https://nonprofitf22.classes.andrewheiss.com), and [microeconomics](https://econs24.classes.andrewheiss.com/) at the [Andrew Young School of Policy Studies](https://aysps.gsu.edu/) at [Georgia State University](https://www.gsu.edu/)
- Working as a part time data science mentor for [Posit Academy](https://posit.co/products/enterprise/academy/)
- Reading some sort of religiously themed text every day ([books](https://www.goodreads.com/review/list/2733632-andrew-heiss?shelf=religious))
